db:info.db:title: Secure Hash Algorithm SHA-3 - brg_endian, version https://github.com/BrianGladman/sha/ commit 4b9e13ead2c5b5e41ca27c65de4dd69ae0bac228

db:article.db:para: SHA-3, originally known as Keccak, is a cryptographic hash function.
The sources can be found in qtbase/src/3rdparty/sha3/brg_endian.h.
